name: Hut 55
address: Deal beach, Marine Road (next to the Sea Scouts), Deal, CT14 7DN
safetyTips: Take away or pre-ordered collection only. Please observe social distancing queuing measures. No outdoor seating. Card payments only.
description: Hut 55 on Deal beach is now open for take away coffee and food (from Saturday 23rd May) and are offering a 'pre-order your picnic' service via our website. Book a picnic bag filled with your favourite Hut goodies from massive sausage rolls to homemade cake, and pick up from our picnic collection point. The deckchairs may have gone, but you are welcome to enjoy your treats on the beautiful beach.
